article_text: Any doubts that the Missouri General Assembly’s priorities are seriously off kilter have been dispelled in this final week of the legislative session. The House speaker became embroiled in a texting scandal, and lawmakers passed polarizing measures and ignored citizens.

article_metadata.news-keywords: John, Diehl, texting, scandal, intern, Missouri, legislature
article_metadata.description: Any doubts that the Missouri General Assembly’s priorities are seriously off kilter have been dispelled in this final week of the legislative session. The House speaker became embroiled in a texting scandal, and lawmakers passed polarizing measures and ignored citizens.
article_metadata.title: The Missouri legislature experiences its most disgraceful week | The Kansas City Star

The House speaker became embroiled in a texting scandal, and lawmakers passed polarizing measures and ignored citizens.
Any doubts that the Missouri General Assembly’s priorities are seriously off kilter have been dispelled in this final week of the legislative session.
